dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: What puny creature dares to intrude upon our domain?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Eldryn Stormcaller, the Arcane Protector, here to bring light to these dark lands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmph, another self-proclaimed hero. Your arrogance will be your undoing.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't seek conflict. Let us discuss a truce for the betterment of all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Truce? Ha! We have no need for weak alliances. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see there is no reasoning with you. Prepare for battle!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your bravery is admirable, but pitiful. Face the wrath of the Coralbone Revenant!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, if you choose the path of conflict, so be it. Let our actions speak for us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As it should be. Steel yourself, for you shall face the might of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not back down from protecting this realm. We can find a peaceful solution.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful solution? Your words hold no weight here. Prepare for the darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I refuse to engage in senseless violence. Let us find a way to coexist.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coexist? Pathetic. Your feeble attempts at diplomacy end in annihilation.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you choose the path of aggression, I will defend this realm with all my power!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Defend? We shall see if your power matches your words. Prepare for the onslaught.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My purpose is clear, to defeat the darkness that threatens this world. Join me in this noble cause.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Noble cause? There is no nobility in your kind. Prepare for the Coralbone Revenant's wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will not shed blood needlessly. Let us find a way to understand each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Understanding? There is no understanding between us. Only destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If understanding is beyond your reach, then let our actions speak for us. The battle begins!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. The time for talk is over, prepare to face your demise.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am no ordinary intruder. I am Eldryn Stormcaller, a force to be reckoned with.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A force? You are nothing but a passing nuisance in our grand scheme.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your grand scheme ends here. I offer you a chance to stand down peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Stand down? Your offer is as empty as your threats. Prepare for the end.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you refuse peace, then let the clash of powers decide the victor!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So eager for battle. We shall see if your power matches your bold words.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Words will not sway you, it seems. Let our actions speak louder than empty promises!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions speak louder than words, indeed. Prepare for the wrath of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I care not for your grand schemes. I am here to bring an end to your malevolent presence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Malevolent presence? You overestimate your abilities, little Half-Elf.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only to bring balance and peace to these lands. Will you heed my words?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Balance and peace? Your words ring hollow. Prepare for the darkness that awaits.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you choose darkness, then let us face it head-on. The battle commences now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Darkness meets light in the clash of powers.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your grand scheme will crumble before my might. Join me in ending this conflict peacefully.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peaceful end to conflict? Your naivety knows no bounds. Prepare for oblivion.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If peace is not an option, then let our strength decide the outcome. The fight begins!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength shall decide. Prepare for the Coralbone Revenant's onslaught.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Actions over words, it is then. The battle is inevitable. Draw your weapon!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions indeed. Let the clash of powers determine the victor.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Eldryn Stormcaller, and I bring a warning of impending doom. Will you listen?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impending doom? Your attempts at fear-mongering amuse us. Speak your last words, Half-Elf.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer knowledge and a way to avoid catastrophe. Will you heed my warning?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Your words hold no weight. Prepare for the wrath of the Coralbone Revenant.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If knowledge is wasted on you, then let our actions speak. The battle is upon us!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions over words. Let the clash of powers decide the fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Words will not save you. Let the strength of our forces determine the outcome!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength shall decide. Prepare for the onslaught of the undead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: In the face of impending doom, will you join forces to avert disaster?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Join forces? Laughable. Your end approaches swiftly, Half-Elf.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: If you crave destruction over cooperation, then let the battle begin.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Destruction it shall be. Prepare for the Coralbone Revenant's wrath.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Actions speak louder than empty promises. Let's see who stands in the end!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions indeed. The clash of powers will decide the victor.
